comments: Previous name was: A simple grammar.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 871
formula: E.g.f.: (1/2)/(exp(x)-1)*(1-(5-4*exp(x))^(1/2)).a(n) = sum(k!*stirling2(n,k)*C(k), k=1..n), C(k) = Catalan numbers (A000108). - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Sep 15 2010a(n) ~ sqrt(10)*n^(n-1) / (exp(n)*(Log(5/4))^(n-1/2)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Sep 30 2013
author: encyclopedia(AT)pommard.inria.fr, Jan 25 2000
extensions: New name using e.g.f., _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Sep 30 2013
